testcase.classname: Verify that the home page is accessible
testcase.name: As a user I should be able to access the home page
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify that the home page header buttons
testcase.name: As a user I should be able to see the various titles when I enter the homepage
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed Then the following headers should be visible from left to right:............passed

testcase.classname: Verify various operations on the home page
testcase.name: User should be able to perform various operations on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the relevant Blog button should be clickable...........................passed And the user clicks on the Blog link........................................passed Then the relevant Blog page should be visible...............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify various operations on the home page
testcase.name: User should be able to perform various operations on homepage
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the home page..........................................passed When the relevant Farmers Market button should be clickable.................passed And the user clicks on the Farmers Market link..............................passed Then the relevant Farmers Market page should be visible.....................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters valid credentials......................................passed And the user clicks on the login button.....................................passed Then the user should be logged in successfully..............................passed
